name: MDL just-the-docs editing guide
description: This site. Serve as the editing guide and documentation for all the MDL just-the-docs site.
when-to-edit: When there's new guidance needed for editing just-the-docs site

name: MDL Gudies Search Page
description: The search catalouge for MDL guides.
when-to-edit: When a new guide is created, existing guide metadata needs to be changed, or an old guide is to be deleted.

name: MDL just-the-docs template
description: A GitHub repository template. For creating a new just-the-docs site with MDL theme applied.
when-to-edit: Almost never unless there's breaking changes for newer version for just-the-docs.

name: MDL just-the-docs theme
description: The remote theme to be applied to every repository created using the jtd-template.
when-to-edit: When new UI components that apply to ALL just-the-docs MDL sites need to be updated.
